description: A popular board game which I was not familiar with before I dive into this project. I am proud of this project nevertheless have one regret. I would love to write a function for the diagonal victory check othern than hard coded one!

descriptin: Eventhough carousels are useless it was interesting to learn about them and apply it in a project. Just enjoy the flowing kitties!

description: This was the first project that seemed complex to me. Luckily I managed to make it work.
The first project we made. Just a single page but shiny!
